thread.title: BREAKING: President Trump To Sign Executive Orders Regarding Immigration On Wednesday
thread.title_full: BREAKING: President Trump To Sign Executive Orders Regarding Immigration On Wednesday

author: Christine Rousselle
title: BREAKING: President Trump To Sign Executive Orders Regarding Immigration On Wednesday
text:
According to the Associated Press , President Donald Trump will sign various immigration actions concerning border security tomorrow, Wednesday. BREAKING: AP Sources: Trump to sign immigration actions Wednesday tightening border security; refugee restrictions to come later. â€” The Associated Press (@AP) January 25, 2017 
Immigration and border security was a central focus of Trump's campaign that helped set him apart from the other Republican candidates during the primary. Trump has spoken repeatedly about the need to build a border wall between the United States and Mexico, as well as deporting people who are in the country illegally. He also featured the loved ones of people killed by illegal immigrants at various campaign events, including the RNC. 
Other sources suggest that Trump may sign executive orders regarding refugees on Wednesday as well.
